channel.title: CVE Feed for Michael Simpson -- Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Michael Simpson -- Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters

item.title: CVE-2024-30558|2024-03-31T19:41:33.356Z -- michael%20simpson -- add%20shortcodes%20actions%20and%20filters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Simpson Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Add Shortcodes Actions And Filters: from n/a through 2.10.
